chunk:
Brand: Way of Will

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Mentha piperita (peppermint) floral water , Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, polysorbate 20, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Mentha Viridis Leaf (Spearmint) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf (Tea Tree) Oil, Abies Sibirica (Fir) Oil
book: 3050-Way of Will Oily Skin Face Toner, 22  (2020 formulation)

chunk: Warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes. If pregnant, suffering from epilepsy, high blood pressure, liver disorder, heart disorder or other medical conditions, consult a health care practitioner before use. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Store below 21 C/ 70 F
book: 3050-Way of Will Oily Skin Face Toner, 22  (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 3050-Way of Will Oily Skin Face Toner, 22  (2020 formulation)
